trans-unit.source: Specifies the different methods by which two geometries can be combined.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來結合兩個幾何的不同方法。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the different geometry combine modes.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示幾何的不同合併模式。

trans-unit.source: ![Different combine modes applied to two geometries](~/add/media/mmgraphics-geometrycombinemodes.png "Different combine modes applied to two geometries")
trans-unit.target: ![不同合併模式套用至兩個幾何](~/add/media/mmgraphics-geometrycombinemodes.png "不同組合套用至兩個幾何模式")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to combine two geometries using the Union combine mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何結合使用 Union 合併模式的兩個幾何。

trans-unit.source: The second region is excluded from the first.
trans-unit.target: 第二個區域不包含在第一個中。

trans-unit.source: Given two geometries, <paramref name="A" /> and <paramref name="B" />, the area of geometry <paramref name="B" /> is removed from the area of geometry <paramref name="A" />, producing a region that is <paramref name="A-B" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的兩個幾何 <paramref name="A" /> 和 <paramref name="B" />，其中幾何 <paramref name="B" /> 的區域會從幾何 <paramref name="A" /> 的區域中移除，產生一個 <paramref name="A-B" /> 的區域。

trans-unit.source: The two regions are combined by taking their intersection.
trans-unit.target: 藉由取得兩個區域的交集來組合它們。

trans-unit.source: The new area consists of the overlapping region between the two geometries.
trans-unit.target: 新區域是由這兩個幾何的重疊區域所組成。

trans-unit.source: The two regions are combined by taking the union of both.
trans-unit.target: 藉由取得兩個區域的聯集來組合它們。

trans-unit.source: The resulting geometry is geometry <paramref name="A" /> + geometry <paramref name="B" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生的幾何是由幾何 <paramref name="A" /> + 幾何 <paramref name="B" /> 所組成。

trans-unit.source: The two regions are combined by taking the area that exists in the first region but not the second and the area that exists in the second region but not the first.
trans-unit.target: 藉由取得第一個區域中存在但第二個區域中不存在的區域以及第二個區域中存在但第一個區域中不存在的區域，來組合這兩個區域。

trans-unit.source: The new region consists of <paramref name="(A-B)" /> + <paramref name="(B-A)" />, where <paramref name="A" /> and <paramref name="B" /> are geometries.
trans-unit.target: 新區域是由 <paramref name="(A-B)" /> + <paramref name="(B-A)" /> 所組成，其中 <paramref name="A" /> 和 <paramref name="B" /> 都是幾何圖形。
